title: Riot games bans players for no reason

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
After a long week of school, I finally had the chance to play some League of Legends and relax. But, for X reasons, Riot Games decided to "suspend permanently" my account. This is super unfair, they never informed me about what I have done wrong. It's really a dick move from Riot games. Please unban me!

You should be ashamed 
Yours truly,
AznPandaaGG{{champion:432}}

replies.body: Have you attempted to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what might be going on yet? Those ban messages aren't customizable for each individual I don't think, so if you just logged in and saw this it's most likely some kind of protective suspension since there was someone trying to hack your account or we noticed other types of suspicious activity. Hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get the chance to figure out what's going on!
Could be for any number of reasons, but riot doesn't just ban people for no reason. Did you check the email they sent to the one bound to the account? Pretty sure that'll tell you why it happened.
